about.built-by: Built as a full-stack end-of-cursus project by:
about.catchphrase: Play, connect, and transcend the ordinary.
about.challenge: Challenge your friends or test your skills against others in Pong and Tetris, reimagined for the web with smooth real-time gameplay, dynamic leaderboards, and sleek design.
about.combination-text: Transcendence 42 combines modern technologies with nostalgic gameplay to deliver an immersive and competitive online experience.
about.description: Transcendence is a modern web application where fun meets functionality, a social gaming platform designed to bring players together through timeless classics.
about.title: About Transcendence 42

forgotPassword.instructions: Enter your email address below to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?

home.landingDescription: Pong meets Tetris on a social platform created to let you enjoy your childhood's games!

error.loginFailed: Login failed. Please try again later

error.usernameRequirements: Username must be 3-20 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

error.passwordRequirements: Password must be between 8 and 64 characters long.

alert.avatarDownloadFailed: Failed to download avatar from URL.

title.emailTotp: Check your email for the code
title.backupCodes: Enter one of your backup codes

instructions.totp: Open your TOTP app and enter the 6-digit verification code displayed there.
instructions.emailTotp: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email [ADDRESS].
instructions.backupCodes: Enter one of your backup codes. Entering a backup code will invalidate it.

twofa.methodText: Select another verification method if needed.

twofa.totpCodeLabel: Enter the code from your app:
twofa.emailOtpLabel: Enter the code sent to your email:
twofa.backupCodesInfo: Please write these codes down and keep them safe. Each code can only be used once.
